import { useState,useEffect } from 'react'; import { connect } from 'react-redux'; import { useHistory } from 'react-router-dom'; import axios from 'axios'; var iamgecart = 'cake1.jpg' export default function CartItem(props) { var [itemcount , setitemcount]=useState(1) var [cakelist, setCakelist] =useState([]) const history = useHistory(); const btn_additem = (id) => { setitemcount(itemcount+1) console.log(id) } const btn_removeitem = (id) => { var spanitemcount = document.getElementById("cartitemcount").innerText console.log(id) } useEffect(()=>{ let apiurl = "https://apifromashu.herokuapp.com/api/cakecart" axios( { headers:{authtoken:localStorage.token}, method:'post', url:apiurl } ).then((response)=>{ setCakelist(response.data.data) console.log(response.data.data) },(error)=>{ console.log("error from all cakes api" , error) }) }, []) const cakeitemlist = cakelist.map((each,index) => (
{console.log(">>>>>>>>"+index.name)}
{each.name}
{itemcount}
{each.price}Rupees
) ) return ( <> {!localStorage.token && history.push("/Login") } {localStorage.token &&

Shopping Cart

3 items

Summary
Item3
315Rupees
TOTAL PRICE
315Rupees
} ); }
